```{r combining all the datasets}
library(skimr)
df = mtcars
df$vs = factor(df$vs)
df$am = factor(df$am)
skim(df)

library(DataExplorer)
introduce(df)
plot_intro(df)
plot_missing(df)
plot_histogram(df)
plot_correlation_df
```
